A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So disappointing. Agree with all the reviewers who described the tedious plot\, lackluster characters\, stupid devices (running out of fuel?! Kylo Ren doing beefcake?! Luke dies when his hologram is cut in half?!?!?)\, and meaningless loose ends. Disney seems to think this franchise is now just about selling merchandise\, hence pointless scenes of myriad unecessary characters to turn into action figures and soda cups. Sad addition to what was once a groundbreaking series.
